EmailTemplate.name: ENG-OpenStack-Nurture.ENG-OpenStack-Early-03.03-OpenStack-e-book
EmailTemplate.subject: OpenStack is Coming, Are You Ready?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-ebook-openstack-for-enterprise-the-tipping-point-cometh/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-openstack&utm_content=early03]]> {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, A fundamental shift in IT is almost upon us – and OpenStack is leading the way. Since its first release in 2010, the open-source cloud operating system has generated incredible momentum and is now invaluable in organizations like Best Buy, PayPal and Comcast. Find out why in our latest e-Book; OpenStack For Enterprise – The Tipping Point Cometh! <[[http://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-ebook-openstack-for-enterprise-the-tipping-point-cometh/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-openstack&utm_content=early03]]> After reading this E-Book you’ll know:
- A brief history of OpenStack - OpenStack releases, programs and their roles - How some of the biggest companies are adopting and using OpenStack - And much more…
<[[http://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-ebook-openstack-for-enterprise-the-tipping-point-cometh/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-openstack&utm_content=early03]]> - The Turbonomic Team
